attributes.action: The UK to take Israel to the ICC on behalf of Palestine
attributes.additional_details:
After countless atrocities and blatant genocide carried out by the Israeli government it is time for the world to stand up and hold them accountable for the murders of thousands of women and children.

As a democratically elected government and a country which respects the legality of the International Criminal Court we as human beings and citizens of the UK should be doing all we can to assist fellow human brings suffering atrocities in Palestine and hold Israel accountable for its nonchalant and bullish behaviour and attitude.

Sign this petition today and let the great lawmakers of our country assist those in need in Palestine and get some much deserved peace and justice.
